title: A Plague Tale: Requiem | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 3 Comparison on GeForce RTX 4090

media:group.media:title: A Plague Tale: Requiem | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 3 Comparison on GeForce RTX 4090
media:group.media:description:
Embark on a heartrending journey in A Plague Tale: Requiem with NVIDIA DLSS 3, boosting non-RT performance by up to 2.5X. Learn More: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/october-2022-rtx-dlss-game-updates/#a-plague-tale-requiem

Dive into the sequel of the award-winning A Plague Tale: Innocence, joining Amicia and Hugo on a heartrending new journey into a brutal, breathtaking world twisted by supernatural forces.

A Plague Tale: Requiem releases October 18 on PC and on NVIDIA GeForce NOW.

For more information: https://www.focus-entmt.com/en/games/a-plague-tale-requiem
